short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download any video from any website, support FB, INS, X, TikTok, Bilibili and other video websites, free, safe and easy to use.
short.zh_CN: 从任何网站下载任何视频，支持FB, INS, X, TikTok, Bilibili 等视频网站，免费、安全、简单易用。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Video Downloader Max is a useful browser extension that allows you to easily and efficiently download any online video from any web page.

Video Downloader Max supports most of the mainstream video streaming sites on the market, including Instagram, X (Twitter), TikTok, Facebook, Bilibili, etc.

Video Downloader Max supports online preview playback before downloading, you can also check the format and size of the video before downloading, and supports direct input of video link download.

Why choose it?

- You can download any available format.

- No need to waste time searching for available videos.

- No ads, spyware or malware.

- No need to register an account to use it.

- Completely free.

Due to restrictions of Google Web Store policies and developer program policies, we are unable to download Youtube videos. Thank you for your understanding.
long.zh_CN:
Video Downloader Max 支持目前市面上大部分主流视频流媒体网站，包括 Instagram、X(原Twitter)、TikTok、 Facebook、B站等。

Video Downloader Max 支持下载前在线预览播放，你也可以在下载前查看视频的格式和大小，并且支持直接输入视频链接下载。

为什么选择它？

- 可以下载任何可用的格式。

- 无需浪费时间搜索可用视频。

- 没有广告、间谍软件或恶意软件。

- 无需注册帐户即可使用。

- 完全免费。

由于 Google Web Store 政策和开发者计划政策的限制，我们无法下载 Youtube 视频。感谢您的理解。
